EmailTemplate.description: Resolution regarding Discount on Air Travels
EmailTemplate.name: SCE EN- DISCOUNT AIR TICKETS
EmailTemplate.subject: Ref nr {!Case.CaseNumber} - {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
To help them in their professional travels, IATA carriers can offer to the IATA Intermediaries some important discounts on their air tickets.
May we invite you to carefully read the related and attached resolution 881.
Yours Sincerely,
{!Case.OwnerFullName} Service Centre Europe International Air Transport Association www.iata.org/europe/cs
